name: FreshOne's DeathMatch series
description: This level is designed for 2-4 player deathmatch. Anything else whould be very boring because there are no monsters. Please e-mail me with your coments! I wish to hear them. This is the second in hopefully a series of Deathmatch wads so look for more comming soon! And hey, if you like it, say so, that way I'm encouraged to make more!
